item.title: Installing GrapheneOS on a Pixel 4a
item.description: Instructions derived from https://grapheneos.org/install/cli Download Developer Tools sudo apt install android-sdk-platform-tools-common sudo apt install signify-openbsd echo "export signify=signify-openbsd" >> ~/.
